function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dedicated architectural programs for containment","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to comply with measures due to lack of resources or knowledge.","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may have low practical capacity to comply with covid-19 mitigation measures, as indicated by the measures of their ability to comply with the measures and the opportunity to violate them.","category":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Measurement of capacity to comply with covid-19 measures involves subjective assessments that may not accurately reflect actual behavior and adherence.","category":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to lack of capacity to comply","category":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in equipment sharing and resource allocation","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unplanned emergency response and lack of preparedness","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for greater integration and stronger eu-level institutions for covid-19 response","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption in the supply chain due to movement control and lockdown","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication and coordination among industry players","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Design decisions influencing the ecology of microbes within a space type, such as the source of ventilation air","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in the built environment microbiome due to function, form, and organization of the building","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in bacterial community structure among faculty offices","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Strong association between spatial connectance distance and microbial community similarity","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High diversity of human occupants in restrooms","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in bacterial communities with human occupancy and room centrality","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of abundant and common otus in dust samples","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in bacterial communities between different architectural spaces","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient sampling depth and rarefaction leading to biased estimates of microbial diversity and composition.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning of pcr equipment leading to contamination of samples","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate temperature control during pcr process leading to compromised amplification","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual extraction of dust from filters","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Thin building design allowing most rooms access to outside air directly through windows and louvers","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Central atrium used for exhausting air through stack ventilation","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding how building design influences indoor microbiome","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in indoor bacterial communities based on building design choices","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the link between design and the microbiology of the indoor environment","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical data collection due to lockdown may limit the scope and accuracy of the research findings.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of standardized questions related to covid-19 may affect the consistency and comparability of the survey data.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited dataset size for 2020 only dataset and 2018 vs. 2020 dataset","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased non-hvac loads in residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Change in daily routine leading to increased use of kitchen appliances during peak time of energy consumption.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-weather normalized loads analysis increases the risk of incomplete understanding of load behavior across a day-long period, potentially leading to inaccurate conclusions.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on outdoor weather conditions for hvac loads","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate load characterization of non-hvac loads","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete data in housing unit records","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of temperature data to analyze hvac use may reveal patterns of occupant behavior and routines.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited monitoring of certain circuits due to the constraints of the home energy monitoring system may result in incomplete data collection, affecting the accuracy of energy use analysis.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to clearly define and communicate zones of safety and hazard in the work environment, leading to increased risk of workers entering hazardous areas unintentionally.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic pressures and workload leading to workers being pushed into hazardous work conditions, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowdown in project planning, design activities, inspections, and maintenance due to social distancing","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in traffic and personal travel patterns in metropolitan cities","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse impact on infrastructure due to reduced workforce and increased healthcare costs","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor urban design and architecture contributing to disease propagation","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undermined indoor environmental quality ieq in buildings","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of good air circulation indoors","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues with indoor air spaces","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of analysis of the impact of external
